A message limit exception's not actually exceptional.
Lawrence, is this the wsdl valdidator or the validation framework?
Vijay, shouldn't the validation framework keep message limit exceptions internal? AFAIK these exceptions are really only interesting for the framework when updating the UI.
This should be fixed in next weeks I build. The changes for the removal of the MessageLimitException functionaliy is removed.Please try it next weeks I build and reopen it if you can reproduce it.

This is part of a mass update to close out all stale WTP defects already verified by the reporter but awaiting closure by the assignee.  If you feel this defect was closed inappropriately, please reopen.

Thanks, John Lanuti
